text: Do you like donating to good causes?
Yes especially to help children.
have you heard of Save the Children?
Not much. Tell me about it.
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
Do they help feed them?
your donation is essential to help ensuring children's rights to health, education, safety, etc
So they help with everything but food?
Not sure about food but I assume it is covered in health needs Here is their website:  URL
Does twenty cents help a lot or just a little?
every bit helps but maybe a little more?
Is fifty cents alright or is that still too little?
That sound good is that how much you want to donate?
I don't know. It seems like that is still too little?
You can donate up to $2 of your payment
How about eighty cents but will that help a lot or just buy them a little?
That sound s good it will help the childre
Maybe I will make it a dollar.
sounds good, final amount $1, have a great day
Ok. A dollar it is then.
